# Portfolio: H.
> Primary Role: Cybersecurity Researcher & CTF Enthusiast

## About this Document
This file provides a machine-readable summary of the ck3r site.

## Professional Summary
H. is an expert in penetration testing, network security, and AI red-teaming. Known for finding vulnerabilities where others see solid code.

---

## Technical Skills
- Web: XSS, SQLi, SSRF, IDOR
- AI: Prompt INjection, Model INversion, Data Poisoning
- Languages: Python, C++ Go, Assembly
